whyHairTransplant.title: Why Get a Hair Transplant in Istanbul, Turkey?
whyHairTransplant.thumbnailImage: Thumbnail Elithair image video for hair transplant in Turkeypause play icon
whyHairTransplant.description:
Are you suffering from hereditary hair loss, a receding hairline or insufficient beard growth? Then a hair surgery in Istanbul is your solution to permanently resolve those baldness issues.

In most cases, hair loss is genetic and can therefore be treated. At Elithair, you will be looked after by accomplished specialists during your hair transplant in Turkey, who only use the latest techniques such as the DHI method.

The country on the Bosphorus is the best place to go for professional hair treatments and above all impresses with its in-depth expertise and high-quality standard.

freeAnalysis.title: Free Hair Analysis
freeAnalysis.description: Finally a Permanent Solution for Your Hair Loss!
freeAnalysis.doctorImage: Image of Dr. Balwi performing hair analysis

aboutDoctor.title: Dr Balwi
aboutDoctor.description: Meet Our Lead Doctor at Elithair
aboutDoctor.doctorImage: Image of Dr. Balwi and a few members of his team in Turkey
aboutDoctor.goals:
To provide the highest quality and flawless final results – those are Dr Balwi’s goals as the leading doctor of our clinic in Istanbul.

Having himself suffered from hair loss, he is able to perfectly understand our patient’s needs. He is also renowned for innovations like the NEO FUE and the SDHI Technique that are exclusive to Elithair.

Thanks to his many years of experience, he is proud to provide renewed hair growth and improved confidence to our patients.

steps.title: Step 1: Online Consultation
steps.description: Fill out our online consultation form and provide us with necessary information about your hair loss condition and medical history. Our experts will review your information and determine the best course of action for your hair transplant in Turkey.

steps.title: Step 2: Personalized Treatment Plan
steps.description: Based on the information you provide, our experts will create a personalized treatment plan tailored to your specific needs. This plan will outline the recommended hair transplant technique, number of grafts, and other relevant details.

steps.title: Step 3: In-Person Consultation in Istanbul
steps.description: Once your personalized treatment plan is ready, we will arrange an in-person consultation with Dr. Balwi at our clinic in Istanbul. During this consultation, Dr. Balwi will examine your hair and scalp, answer any questions you may have, and finalize the treatment plan.

techniques.name: NEO FUE Technique
techniques.description: The NEO FUE technique is an exclusive innovation of Elithair. It combines the advantages of the traditional FUE method with additional features that optimize the hair transplant process. With NEO FUE, you can expect minimal scarring, faster healing, and natural-looking results.

techniques.name: DHI Technique
techniques.description: The DHI technique, also known as Direct Hair Implantation or Choi Implanter Pen technique, involves the direct implantation of hair follicles without the need for recipient site creation beforehand. This technique ensures maximum precision, density, and natural results.

techniques.name: SDHI Technique
techniques.description: The SDHI technique, also developed exclusively by Elithair, stands for Superior DHI and combines the benefits of the DHI technique with advanced technology for even better results. It allows for higher hair density and precise placement of grafts, ensuring a natural and aesthetically pleasing hairline.

beforeAfterGallery.title: Before and After Hair Transplant Results
beforeAfterGallery.description: Take a look at the impressive transformations our patients have achieved through hair transplant at Elithair. These before and after photos showcase the natural-looking results and restored hairlines that can be achieved with our advanced techniques and expert medical team.

prices.title: Hair Transplant Prices at Elithair
prices.description: At Elithair, we offer transparent and competitive prices for our hair transplant procedures. The cost of your hair transplant will depend on factors such as the technique used, the number of grafts required, and any additional treatments or services. Contact us for a personalized quote based on your specific needs.

packages.name: Basic Package
packages.description: Includes the hair transplant procedure using the chosen technique and a dedicated medical team.

packages.name: Premium Package
packages.description: Includes the hair transplant procedure using the chosen technique, a dedicated medical team, accommodation in our Elit-Hotel rooms, and airport transfers.

packages.name: VIP Package
packages.description: Includes the hair transplant procedure using the chosen technique, a dedicated medical team, accommodation in our luxury suite, VIP airport transfers, and a personal assistant.

contact.title: Contact Elithair for a Hair Transplant in Turkey
contact.description: If you're ready to take the next step toward restoring your hair and regaining your confidence, contact Elithair to schedule a consultation or request more information. Our friendly team is here to answer your questions and assist you throughout the process.
